message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $13500. I believe this price is still a great value for the product's unique features and benefits.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $12500?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $13000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my costs.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12000?
